attributes.action: put pressure on physics to work as easily in three dimentions as it does in two, or even one, dimention.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is well accepted that mathematical calculations are generally easier in one or two dimentions than in three. We urge the Prime Minister to put pressure on physics, and to a similar extent mathematics, to make these calculations easier for students to do, particularly under the time constraints of an exam.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
